text: Ezɨ Sodomia mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam baregha ghaze, “Gumazir kam, a nguibar igharazimɨn gumazim, egha a en araziba tuisɨghasava ami. Nɨ e gitagh. Nɨ e gitaghan koghtɨ, e arazir kurabar aning damuam. Egh e uaghan mɨzazitam nɨ gaseghtɨ nɨ fogham, nɨn mɨzazim, aningɨn mɨzazim gafiragham.” Egha me ua Lotɨn suiragha a munasaragha egha tiam akarasa.
